title: From Transcribing for Obama to Writing Her Own Story
description: Beck Dorey-Stein discusses “From the Corner of the Oval,” and Caroline Weber talks about “Proust’s Duchess: How Three Celebrated Women Captured the Imagination of Fin-De-Siècle Paris.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
